description: This course is designed for students who have little or no knowledge of Korean. This course aims at developing foundational reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills through meaningful communicative activities and tasks. Upon successful completion of this course, students should be able to comprehend and carry on simple daily conversations and create simple sentences in the past, present, and future tenses. Students will learn how to introduce themselves, describe their surroundings, talk about their daily lives, friends and relatives, and talk about past and future events.
name: ELEMENTARY KOREAN I: Korean Summer Language Institute

values.name: ELEMENTARY KOREAN I: Korean Summer Language Institute
